text.title: D E S I G N I N G    A N D    B U I L D I N G    S O M E T H I N G    U N I Q U E
text.colOne: After discussing the project with the client, we agreed that we both wanted to create something unique. We started working on the wireframes and come up with several different wire options. The one below seemed to have the most potencial.
text.colTwo: With the website foundations in place we started working on the user experience. We wanted tell a story about Jemimah and guide users logically through the experience.  The homepage become a big poster that connects all the other  website sections.
